attributes.action:
Do not raise national insurance or intruduce 
Health and Social Care Levy
attributes.additional_details: We are already facing staff shortage and as a result we can't get fuel and anything adding more expenses will just simply scare away all the workers and they won't work and as a result we will end up with no food or anything and thus we will be poor like Africa. This will lead starvation. So adding any kind of tax will be like adding petrol to fire. So I request the government not to increase national insurance or intruduce a Health and Social Care Levy. This will lead to lot of suicide
attributes.background: I want the government to not the indruduce a health and Social Care Levy. Increasing national insurance or intruducing government levy will seriously harm our economy and. Uk is on the verge of collapsing economicly.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596514
